2110430.name: Depois da chuva de meteoros
2110430.description:
In "Space Adventure: Ship Rescue," you play as an astronaut who, after an accident during a meteor shower, crashes on an unknown and hostile planet. Your mission is to explore this mysterious world, face alien monsters, and collect scattered parts and screws to rebuild your ship. With dynamic platforming and shooting gameplay, three difficulty levels, simultaneous saves, and a unique black-and-white cartoonish art style, this game offers a long, fun, and challenging experience. Assemble your ship and get ready for a triumphant return home, with your performance determined by the number of screws collected. Are you ready for this epic adventure?
several different enemies, monster bosses, etc...
3 difficulties that can be saved simultaneously.
68 passages approximately
2110430.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
